dict.string: Today is 38 days, which are five weeks and three days, of the Omer
Hoy es treinta y ocho días, que son cinco semanas y tres días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est trente-huit jours, qui sont cinq semaines et trois jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ТРИДЦАТЬ ВОСЕМЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ПЯТЬ НЕДЕЛЬ И ТРИ ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם שְׁמוֹנָה וּשְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם חֲמִשָּׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וּשְׁלֹשָׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר
Bonding needs to be not only loving but also compassionate, feeling your friend's pain and empathizing with him.
Be Grateful for the Small, Quiet Things People Do For You
Rabbi Simon Jacobson discsusses the essence of gratitude, and an important ramification of it. Sometimes power is in the quietest moments.
Offer help and support in dealing with an ordeal of someone you have bonded with.
Do I withdraw when I am uncomfortable with my friend's troubles?
